left_text: Claws of female simple; arolia unusually small; mandible with large, right-angular preapical tooth separated from apex by deep notch; head strongly elevated behind ocelli; body length over 15 mm
right_text: Claws of female with inner tooth; arolia of ordinary size; mandible simple, preapical tooth vestigial or absent; head not or weakly elevated behind ocelli; body length 12 mm or less
